external_data_requirements.spot: underlying spot price at the valuation time
external_data_requirements.ivol: implied volatility at the valuation time
external_data_requirements.atm_ivol: At the money implied volatility for each expiry

spot_vol_shocks.cost_of_carry_rate: set to default for BS (1973) stock option model

vol_surface_shocks.atm_ivol: at the money implied vol for each expiry
vol_surface_shocks.days_to_trade: This will be calculated by the model using PositionVega and DailyVegaThreshold
